title: Video: Haunted Hearts – Johnny Jupiter
content:
Haunted Hearts is the husband and wife duo of Dum Dum Girls’ Dee Dee Penny and Crocodiles’ Brandon Welch. The video for new cut Johnny Jupiter is all colour, psychedelia and androgyny and is certainly a fitting background to the track. Drifting along at a dream like pace for the full four minutes and fifteen seconds, Johnny Jupiter doesn’t really go anywhere, but it feels like an instant and an eternity all at the same time. Mesmerising stuff…

Check out the visuals for Johnny Jupiter above and catch Crocodiles supporting Dum Dum Girls across the UK in May.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
